entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
